message.content:
{
  "daily_summary": "Constructive day for mid/small caps with strong closes near day-highs across metals (HINDCOPPER, SAIL), infra/PSUs (NBCC, RVNL), exchanges (BSE, MCX, CDSL) and select IT (PERSISTENT, TATAELXSI). Consumer names (VBL, MARICO) stayed firm. Some profit-taking/weakness in select names (ITI, UNOMINDA, KAYNES, HAVELLS). Banks were mixed. Our book benefited from HINDCOPPER’s strong range close; BEL remains slightly below cost but stable.",
  "top_signals": [
    {"symbol": "SAIL", "signal": "Buy on breakout", "reason": "Strong range-day; close near high (metals momentum). Prefer entry only on strength above 137 with tight risk to 131.6.", "price": 136.46},
    {"symbol": "NBCC", "signal": "Buy on continuation", "reason": "PSU/infra bid; high close location value and steady trend. Buy on shallow dip to 112–113 or strength >114.", "price": 113.65},
    {"symbol": "NYKAA", "signal": "Buy on strength", "reason": "Bullish day closing near highs; a daily close above 265 can confirm continuation. Risk to 256.5.", "price": 264.11},
    {"symbol": "VBL", "signal": "Buy on dips", "reason": "Wide-range up day; momentum intact. Prefer pullback entries 439–442 with risk to 432.", "price": 445.90},
    {"symbol": "BSE", "signal": "Watch for pullback buy", "reason": "Range expansion and close near highs; slightly extended. Stagger entries on dips toward 2280–2300.", "price": 2330.20},
    {"symbol": "MAZDOCK", "signal": "Breakout watch", "reason": "Defense/shipbuilding strength; price parked just below round 2900. Trigger >2900 with risk to 2800.", "price": 2888.70},
    {"symbol": "HINDCOPPER", "signal": "Hold/Trail", "reason": "Strong close near highs; trail partials and consider profit-booking into 370–375 if spiky move persists.", "price": 364.15},
    {"symbol": "ITI", "signal": "Avoid/Weakness", "reason": "Intraday breakdown from 350s; weak close. Avoid fresh longs until it reclaims 345–350 with follow-through.", "price": 337.70}
  ],
  "emergency_trades": [
    {"symbol": "HINDCOPPER", "action": "Sell", "reason": "Partial profit if euphoric spike; lock gains without exiting core.", "quantity": 5, "price": 375.00},
    {"symbol": "HINDCOPPER", "action": "Sell", "reason": "Protect gains if sharp reversal; stop-loss tranche.", "quantity": 10, "price": 349.80}
  ],
  "portfolio": {
    "cash": 13830.50,
    "total_value": 26209.05,
    "holdings_count": 2,
    "holdings": [
      "HINDCOPPER: 25 units @ 312.00 (CMP 364.15)",
      "BEL: 8 units @ 412.65 (CMP 409.35)"
    ]
  },
  "screening_notes": [
    "Metals/PSU strength: HINDCOPPER, SAIL robust; watch for follow-through Monday. Consider SAIL as the higher-liquidity satellite to our HINDCOPPER core.",
    "Infra/rail PSU bid continues: NBCC strong; RVNL steady. Prefer staggered entries on minor dips.",
    "Exchanges theme hot: BSE, CDSL breakouts; MCX very strong but price-per-share is high for our wallet—keep on watch-only.",
    "Selective IT momentum: PERSISTENT, TATAELXSI, KPITTECH firm. Given ticket sizes, wait for dips or keep as watchlist rather than immediate buys.",
    "Consumer strength: VBL leadership; MARICO firm. VBL buy-the-dip favored over chasing highs.",
    "Weak/avoid list for now: ITI breakdown; UNOMINDA heavy sell-off to 1250–1260 support (watch for reversal candle before acting); KAYNES under pressure.",
    "Banks mixed: AUBANK closed weak; private banks need confirmation. Avoid fresh exposure in small/private lenders till strength resumes.",
    "Risk management for Monday: Prioritize 2–3 adds from SAIL, NBCC, NYKAA, VBL. Example sizing within cash: SAIL 30@≤137.5 (~₹4.1k), NBCC 40@≤114 (~₹4.6k), NYKAA 10@≤265 (~₹2.6k). Keep ~₹2–3k cash buffer.",
    "Stops/levels: For any Monday entries, cap per-position risk to ~2% of portfolio (~₹520) using logical stops (below day low/structure). Trail winners rather than over-trading.",
    "If Friday gaps up sharply across PSUs, prefer patience—let first 15–30 mins settle and buy only on consolidations/breakouts with volume."
  ]
}
